name: Unknown Dream...
description:
Samantha is a troubled girl trapped in a recurring nightmare of anxiety and fear.

Click/Press Space to evade the nightmare creatures that represent the common fears and anxieties of children and adults alike. Collect healing crystals to advance.

Witness Samantha’s ethereal journey through cities, plains, forests, and mountains.

 

Design: Ross A. Hersemann, @Loadinglaw, www.loadinglaw.com

Programming: Leonard Wedderburn, @ktp4life, www.leonardport.pogky.com

Art: Monica Fan, @bunnyscat,  www.monicafan.com

Sound: Tom Caprel, @HCResearchCo, www.hcresearch.co
